title: The Heavenly Palace Master’s Counterattack - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Martial Arts   Romance   Xianxia   Yaoi
tags: Betrayal   Cold Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cultivation   Dao Companion   Devoted Love Interests   Distrustful Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Inheritance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Master-Disciple Relationship   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Revenge   Saving the World   Second Chance   Slow Romance   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Tsundere   Unconditional Love
author: 衣落成火
description:
Yu Tianze was stupid in his life, so he decided to be smarter in this life.

He spent his life being incredibly filial to his master, handing over all his hard-won treasures. In the end he was betrayed by the one he trusted the most and killed due to the greed of others. 

He wakes up in the past, and this time, he's determined to change his fate. After a coincidental meeting, he decides to take the only person who showed him a sliver of kindness in his darkest hour as his disciple, and thus begins this master and disciple's rise to the top.>
